column4: I'm having problems with Wikipedia, in Firefox 1.9.0.10. I'm using Ubuntu 8.10, and the math (formulas in Latex) aren't rendered in Wikipedia! Is there anything I can do to fix this?
I'm running updates on a regular basis, as Ubuntu tells me to
it shouldn't have anything to do with your ubuntu
could you give me a link to an article that you experience this with?
*some* of the math is there, but almost everything in the "Fano's Inequality" paragraph is gone
they're all png images, so they should work
The only one working in that section, is "H(e) = − P(e)logP(e) − (1 − P(e))log(1 − P(e))"
I typed "about:" in the address bar
have you tried refreshing the page with ctrl-f5?
yes. the problem is quite persitant
wireless... but I don't think that could be it...?
if NetworkManager deals with your network, the interfaces may be up before fstab is read and used, but it will not mean there's network connection available
